item.title: Static Website Analytics
item.description: In this post we’re going to build a simple serverless self-hosted analytics system. This is the simple set-up that I currently use to track visitors to my website. We’ll use a few simple tools to track visitors of our websites. Overview The tools and services we’re going to use to build our simple analytics are: Golang Serverless framework AWS Lambda AWS Cloudwatch Javascript Golang/AWS Lambda/Serverless Framework To get things off the ground we want to implement a lambda function that we can hit when someone vists our website.
